hero.title: Hi, I'm Tarun!
hero.des0: I am a rising junior at Nazarbayev University majoring in CS.
hero.des1: I enjoy creating high-quality software products with a complex logic behind it.
hero.des2: My technology stack includes React, TypeScript and Golang.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my most favourite projects that I enjoyed coding and designing from scratch, both with a team and alone.

laddy.subtitle: Get better by solving problems
laddy.description: Web app selects and lets you solve algorithmic problems of your level by looking at your Codeforces rating.

nuopen.subtitle: Freshest ICPC competition
nuopen.description: Landing page for the largest open programming competition organized by Nazarbayev University students.

railwayz.subtitle: Samruk Hackathon Winner
railwayz.description: Accurate prediction of the number of railway carriages required for different routes. "Best Architecture" title among all teams. Project made by Janbyr Inc.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I am passionate about using cutting-edge technologies. These are the tools I am most familiar with and build things every day.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Here are some great companies I had the honour to join for working on various interesting projects.

contact.title: Wanna reach out?
contact.description: Feel free to drop me a message if you have some interesting offer or you want to hang out.

citation.content: Ninjas are not born, they are made
citation.author: カンフー・パンダ
